name: Venomancer
title: Lesale Deathbringer
lore: Once a chemist, Lesale was transformed by his own experiments into a creature of pure venom.

venomousGale.name: Venomous Gale
venomousGale.description: Launches a wave of poison that damages and slows enemies over time.

poisonSting.name: Poison Sting
poisonSting.description: Venomancer's attacks poison enemies, dealing damage over time and slowing.

plagueWard.name: Plague Ward
plagueWard.description: Summons a ward that attacks enemies and applies Poison Sting.

poisonNova.name: Poison Nova
poisonNova.description: Releases a ring of poison that damages all enemies over time. Cannot kill.
